full_summary:
================================
# Tender Alert

### Title
Janitorial and Commercial Cleaning Services at the Embassy of Canada to Indonesia

### Reference
PW-22-01011596

### Public Posting Date
October 28, 2022

### Submission Deadline
November 29, 2022, 2:00 PM (ET)

### Solicitation No.
22-213427

### Classification
SRV (Services)

### Type of Request
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method
Competitive – Open Bidding

### Purpose
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) seeks a supplier to provide janitorial and commercial cleaning services at the Embassy of Canada to Indonesia.

### Scope of Work
The successful bidder will be required to provide cleaning services, estimated quantity not specified, over a period of two years (2022-2024).

### Eligibility
This tender opportunity is open to all qualified suppliers who meet the specified requirements.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation of bids will be based on the bidder's ability to meet the requirements specified in the RFP.

### Documents
All relevant documents, including the RFP and terms and conditions, are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.

### Contact
For more information, please contact Nancy Levasseur at [internationalproposals@international.gc.ca](mailto:internationalproposals@international.gc.ca).

### Attachments
The following documents are attached:
* [22-213427_-_jkrta_-_rfp_-_janitorial_and_commercial_cleaning_services_at_the_embassy_of_canada_to_indonesia.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/28/cc3874ec7e775046248173ecb59f488b/)
* [22-213427_-_jkrta_-_ddp_-_services_de_nettoyage_a_lambassade_du_canada_en_indonesie.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/28/fd380ce8b23e34c0881571d2e36af52e/)

Note: The rewritten text has been reformatted in a more readable and concise manner, with proper headings and punctuation. The content has been rephrased to improve clarity and accuracy. All relevant information has been included, while excluding unnecessary details.
